course_title: Interdisciplinary Seminar: Reducing Drug Related Harms
class_notes:
Complete Topic:  Reducing Drug-Related Harms Using Big Data:  Administrative, geospatial, and network sources.  This course will require computing in different programs and different environments. Familiarity and comfort with the following is needed to successfully complete the course:
 Regression (examples: BIOS 501, BSHES 700)
 SAS (examples: BIOS 501)
 R (examples: BIOS 544)
PLEASE CONTACT HANNAH COOPER FOR PERMISSION TO ENROLL IN THE COURSE: hcoope3@emory.edu
sections: Class Nbr: 3132, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: F 10a-1p, Instructor: Team, Status: Open
